lines.text: [Last lines, English version, while Piccolo and Vegeta sit back to back on a floating ice glacier]
Is it over?
Not till the fish jumps.
[a small fish jumps from the water and falls back in]
It's over.
13. That's your unlucky number. And I'm not talking about silly superstition; I'm talking about yours truly.

[to Trunks]
I don't care about your thirty dollar haircut!
[shouts]
Goku dies!

[mouthful]
Eat up, son. You're a growing boy. You don't eat enough in your age.
I don't know, Dad. If i ate any more, I think I'd pop.
If you ever stop training, your muscles are going to turn into flab from all that food you eat!
[#14 and #15 are watching Goku eat]
Time for the last course.
Let's serve it up good.
[They fire their twin blast]
[#14 and #15 have blasted an elevator door open. People are sprawled across the floor]

[casually dusting himself off]
No, please, don't get up.

[to Super Android 13]
You know what's funny about the future? You're no where to be seen. You're not in the future because you die right here and now - TODAY!
[unsheathes his sword]
